parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X position for the auxiliary view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y position for the auxiliary view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z position for the auxiliary view

parameters.name: NotAligned
parameters.description: True aligns the view from its owner, false does not

parameters.name: Label
parameters.description: String that holds label of the auxiliary view

parameters.name: Showarrow
parameters.description: True shows the arrow, false hides the arrow

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True flips the side shown in the auxiliary view, false does not

title: IDrawingDoc.ICreateAuxiliaryViewAt2
description: Creates an auxiliary view based on a selected edge in a drawing view.
signature:
View ICreateAuxiliaryViewAt2( 
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
,
   System.Boolean
NotAligned
,
   System.String
Label
,
   System.Boolean
Showarrow
,
   System.Boolean
Flip
)

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X position for the auxiliary view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y position for the auxiliary view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: Z position for the auxiliary view

parameters.name: NotAligned
parameters.description: True aligns the view from its owner, false does not

parameters.name: Label
parameters.description: String that holds label of the auxiliary view

parameters.name: Showarrow
parameters.description: True shows the arrow, false hides the arrow

parameters.name: Flip
parameters.description: True flips the side shown in the auxiliary view, false does not

returns: Pointer to the newly created auxiliary view
